name: Family
overview:
This class allows you interact with Google Cloud Bigtable.

First, install @google-cloud/bigtable with npm:

$ npm install --save @google-cloud/bigtable

If you are running your app on Google Compute Engine, you won't need to worry about supplying connection configuration options to @google-cloud/bigtableâ€” we figure that out for you.

However, if you're running your app elsewhere, you will need to provide project details to authenticate API requests.

Compute Engine

var bigtable = require('@google-cloud/bigtable')();

Elsewhere

var bigtable = require('@google-cloud/bigtable')({ projectId: 'grape-spaceship-123', keyFilename: '/path/to/keyfile.json' });

The full set of options which can be passed to @google-cloud/bigtable are outlined in our Authentication guide.
